ing: 4 large red grapefruit, peeled and sectioned
salt and cracked black pepper to taste
des: "A beautiful salad and a terrific combination of flavors!"
ins: Arrange the grapefruit sections and avocado slices attractively in a shallow serving dish. In a bowl, whisk together the orange juice, olive oil, lime juice, and honey until well combined; drizzle the dressing over the grapefruit and avocado slices. Season to taste with salt and black pepper. Serve immediately.
